item.title: Trump orders 'new' census that excludes undocumented immigrants
item.description: Trump sought to alter the census during his first term in office by attempting to add a citizenship question to the survey.

item.title: The full list of U.S. tariffs in place around the world
item.description: Tariffs on dozens of key U.S. trading partners came into effect Thursday.

item.title: Russia and UAE double down on trade, testing U.S. limits
item.description: Russian business in the UAE has ballooned since Moscow's invasion of Ukraine in 2022, as its citizens fled sanctions and mandatory conscription.

item.title: Trump vows 100% tariff on chips, unless companies are building in the U.S.
item.description: President Donald Trump said he will impose a 100% tariff on imports of semiconductors and chips, but not for companies that are "building in the Unite...

item.title: Trump contorts timeline of jobs report revisions in effort to justify firing BLS chief
item.description: Trump's firing of the BLS commissioner has raised fears that government employment data, used to make major economic policy decisions, will become pol...
